creator: The CXApp
descriptionHtml:
PEP@Work is the all-in-one concierge app that allows Users to:

• Navigate the workplace
• Reserve time and space in the office
• Access helpful information about the building
• Stay up-to-date on the latest events on campus

This app is compatible with phones running Android 8 and higher.
descriptionShort: PEP@Work is the all-in-one concierge app
title: PEP@Work

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are introducing the ability to invite visitors to the campus through the application. Pre-register guests and view your list of registered guests. You can also receive notifications when your guest(s) arrive!
